# Swift 第三方库（个人精选）

## 网络
* [Just](https://github.com/JustHTTP/Just)
* [Reachability.swift](https://github.com/ashleymills/Reachability.swift)

### 网络图片
* [Kingfisher](https://github.com/onevcat/Kingfisher)

## JSON
* [SwiftyJSON](https://github.com/SwiftyJSON/SwiftyJSON)
* [HandyJSON](https://github.com/alibaba/HandyJSON)

## 数据库
* [Realm](https://github.com/realm/realm-cocoa)
* [YTKKeyValueStore_Swift](https://github.com/sgxiang/YTKKeyValueStore_Swift)(Sqlite封装)

## 本地化(多语言)
* [Localize-Swift](https://github.com/marmelroy/Localize-Swift)

## 自动布局(AutoLayout)
* [SnapKit](https://github.com/SnapKit/SnapKit)

##  图片、相机、相册相关
* [swiftScan](https://github.com/MxABC/swiftScan)
* [SwViewCapture](https://github.com/startry/SwViewCapture)

## 小工具
* [Siren](https://github.com/ArtSabintsev/Siren)
* [Proposer](https://github.com/nixzhu/Proposer)
* [Device](https://github.com/Ekhoo/Device)

## UI

### 提示和Alert
* [PKHUD](https://github.com/pkluz/PKHUD)
* [APESuperHUD](https://github.com/apegroup/APESuperHUD)
* [Toaster](https://github.com/devxoul/Toaster)
* [Toast-Swift](https://github.com/scalessec/Toast-Swift)
* [Swift-Prompts](https://github.com/GabrielAlva/Swift-Prompts)
* [SweetAlert-iOS](https://github.com/codestergit/SweetAlert-iOS)
* [NoticeBar](https://github.com/qiuncheng/NoticeBar)
* [Dodo](https://github.com/marketplacer/Dodo)
* [BRYXBanner](https://github.com/bryx-inc/BRYXBanner)
* [EasyTipView](https://github.com/teodorpatras/EasyTipView)
* [XLActionController](https://github.com/xmartlabs/XLActionController)

### 下拉上拉刷新
* [ESPullToRefresh](https://github.com/eggswift/pull-to-refresh)
* [PullToRefreshSwift](https://github.com/dekatotoro/PullToRefreshSwift)

### 空白页
* [EmptyKit](https://github.com/eilianlove/EmptyKit)
* [TBEmptyDataSet](https://github.com/teambition/TBEmptyDataSet)
* [StatefulViewController](https://github.com/aschuch/StatefulViewController)

### 进度
* [KYCircularProgress](https://github.com/kentya6/KYCircularProgress)
* [WaveLoadingView](https://github.com/liuzhiyi1992/WaveLoadingView)

### NavigationBar
* [AMScrollingNavbar](https://github.com/andreamazz/AMScrollingNavbar)

### 动画
* [D3View](https://github.com/mozhenhau/D3View)


# 第三方Swift资源总结

1. [awesome-swift](https://github.com/matteocrippa/awesome-swift) ( [APP下载](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/awesome-for-swift-cheatsheet/id1078115427) )
2. [TimLiu-iOS/Swift](https://github.com/Tim9Liu9/TimLiu-iOS/blob/master/Swift.md)
